userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington and Lee University Special Collections and Archives are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source. Permission for publication of this material, in part or in full, must be secured with the Head of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation: [Identification of item], John Paul Dull Papers, WLU Coll. 0072, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA.
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections staff to verify the appropriate format.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Miss Rachel Koiner in 1965.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes 16 letters from Dull to his wife, written while serving, first in the valley, then in eastern Virginia near Petersburg, with the Stonewall Brigade, 5th Division, in the army of the Confederate States of America; a photograph; and printed genealogy of the Koiner family.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research use.
